messages.title: Selected for Reading West
messages.content: Into Battle is delighted to announce that Olivia Bailey has been selected to stand as the Parliamentary Candidate for Reading West. Olivia was born at the Royal Berks, and grew up in Berkshire. She has got a strong track record running campaigns and research on the national stage, and hopes to be a community-focused MP like Martin Salter before her.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: I will fight Tory cuts to local schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will keep class sizes down, drive up standards and reintroduce the EMA for pupils from lower income households.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: I will stand up for our struggling NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will fight to improve local GP services like Circuit Lane Surgery and back overstretched staff. Labour will always give the NHS the money it needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: I will fight Tory plans for a reckless Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will put jobs, rights and prosperity first in the Brexit negotiations. Labour will also guarantee the right of EU nationals to remain in the UK, and secure fairer controls on immigration.
Labour will build a million new homes and introduce tough new controls on unscrupulous private landlords.
